scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y gconf-service libasound2 libatk1.0-0 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libxcomposite1 libxrandr2 libxdamage1 libx11-xcb1 libxcursor1 libxext6 libxi6 libxtst6 libappindicator1 libsecret-1-0 libgbm-dev lsof xvfb && npm rebuild puppeteer
